TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerGlyph extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 在活動設計工具最上層的疊置順序位置繪製圖樣 (Glyph)。

span.span: Draws a glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 類別為工作流程設計介面上使用之所有設計工具圖像的基底類別 (Base Class)。The class is the base class for all designer glyphs used on a workflow design surface. 活動設計工具開發人員可以使用繼承自 的類別在 介面上繪製自訂圖像。Activity designer developers can use classes that inherit from to draw custom glyphs onto the surface of an . 類別可在最上層的疊置順序繪製此類圖像，這會將自訂圖像以視覺方式放置在設計工具上所有其他圖像的上方，而放置方式則是以自訂圖像的 值為基礎。 classes draw such glyphs at the top-level Z order, which places the custom glyph visually on top of all other glyphs on the designer based on the value of the custom glyph. 較低的 屬性值表示擁有較高的優先權，因此會在活動設計工具上最上層的疊置順序位置繪製圖像。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範從 類別衍生的圖像類別。The following code example demonstrates a glyph class that derives from the class. 程式碼會覆寫 和 方法。The code overrides the and methods. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#132](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#132)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#132](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#132)]

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: .
Workflow Monitor

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則 會傳回與圖像關聯之活動設計工具的界限。Unless overridden in a derived class, returns the bounds of the activity designer with which the glyph is associated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 方法。The following code example demonstrates how you can override the method. 程式碼可設定自訂圖像物件的大小和位置。The code sets the size and location of the custom glyph object. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). Workflow Monitor

summary.span: 表示 最高的可能優先權。

span.span: Represents the highest priority possible for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較低的 屬性值表示擁有較高的優先權，因此會在活動設計工具上最上層的疊置順序位置繪製圖像。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer. 值欄位為 0。The value of the field is 0. > [!NOTE] > 這個常數值會在建立自訂圖像時當做方針。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 當您設計自訂圖像時，可以隨意針對 屬性使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

summary.span: 表示 最低的可能優先權。

span.span: Represents the lowest priority possible for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較高的 屬性值表示擁有較低的優先權，因此會在活動設計工具上最下層的疊置順序位置繪製圖像。A high value for the property indicates a lower priority and therefore draws the glyph at the bottom-most Z order position on an activity designer. 值欄位是 1000000。The value of the field is 1000000. > [!NOTE] > 這個常數值會在建立自訂圖像時當做方針。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 當您設計自訂圖像時，可以隨意針對 屬性使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

summary.span: 代表 的一般優先權。

span.span: Represents the normal priority for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較低的 屬性值表示較高的優先權，而較高的值則表示較低的優先權。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority whereas a higher value indicates a lower priority. 欄位的值是 10000。The value of the field is 10000. > [!NOTE] > 這個常數值會在建立自訂圖像時當做方針。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 當您設計自訂圖像時，可以隨意針對 屬性使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 繪製註解圖像界限和要填滿的 。 uses to draw the bounds of the comment glyph and to fill it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 方法。The following code example demonstrates how you can override the method. 程式碼可自訂在與圖像關聯之活動設計工具上繪製圖像物件的方式。The code customizes how to draw the glyph object on the activity designer with which the glyph is associated. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). summary.span: 取得設計工具圖像在活動設計介面上的優先權設定。

span.span: Gets the priority setting for the designer glyph on the activity design surface.

value.span: 整數值，代表活動設計工具介面上 的優先權設定。

span.span: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the on the activity designer surface.

value.span: 較低的值表示擁有較高的優先權，因此會在活動設計工具上最上層的疊置順序位置繪製圖像。

span.span: A lower value indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
